lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back to our second half of our Shadow of War game, brought to you and sponsored by WB Games. Thank you so much for letting this happen. All of us are all voice actors in the game, in case you didn't check out the intro to the first half. We're excited to bring these orcish characters of this one-shot together. If you haven't seen the first half, you should probably go back and watch that first. Otherwise, you'll be really confused.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should because it's really good.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, we could do it right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, do it all again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! Fine! But yeah, Shadow of War comes out October 10th, looking forward to that. The Shadow of War iOS and Android game is out now, so check it out. Anyway, bringing us back in. As the Forcs--

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: The Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the Forcs have taken their break to rest themselves for a moment, to assess what to do next, you are now standing on the opposite edge of one of the Mithrim Spur Mountains, just past the crest. As you traveled down, you found hidden in this alcove, six uruks, five of which are currently sleeping and bundled, and one who's keeping watch with a burning torch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, did we actually take a short rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got the numbers wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it was intentional.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We took a moment, so I didn't actually get my action surge back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why are you Australian now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's super flexible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you worry about it, Samuel.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: So we can go back, "Oh, right!" Because apparently (French accent) I am this orc. I enjoy a fork.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Slavic. Listen, I have not bathed a short sword in blood under the cover of dark in so long! I want to sneak up, and I want to take their bowels and pull them out while they sleep. But! We have to take care of that one that's watching guard, first. Who's sneaky?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I run down there and kill him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Naw, are you sneaky?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you look?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Skak, don't you have some sort of a crossbow?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe you should be the one to take him down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we can lead him toward us and then--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we could cause a diversion!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and then you can take him out away from the guards that're sleeping.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. If we make a noise or something, won't he wake up everybody else?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we hit him with a rock and he comes looking for it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, or you crack a branch, right? (cracking noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's a good idea! And I take a really big branch and I break it in half.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. We're dumb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance over, you see the one with the torch is now like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 25 feet from you, 30 feet, down below.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Crossbow him!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (hooting)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's now walking toward one of them to start--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying to sound like an owl in the night. Hoo-hoo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a performance check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I aid her? Can I aid her with my Minor Illusion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. How-- what are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's make it, like, a two-headed owl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it. Do I roll at advantage, then?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I rolled a three. Minus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing) So it's a (gurgling).

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (hooting and gurgling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, harmony.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (harmonizing) Hoo!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Little pitchy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The uruk keeping guard immediately goes, "What the shrak?" Goes and starts shaking one of them awake.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Hit him before he does that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the crossbow and I try to put it right in the back, where his head meets his neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He doesn't currently see you, necessarily. Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not seem to see you, so roll advantage on the attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll the dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. d8 plus four. Eight, (counting).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, roll your sneak attack damage too, because that all gets doubled as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 22 times two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double dice. So 22 times two? As he's shaking one of the uruk, he's like, "Hey, get up! Oof!" (gurgling) The one uruk's like, "What the shit? "I was sleeping!" The other one's like, (gurgling) and falls onto his back, dead. He's like, "Huh?" The other one's getting up. He's leaning forward now, inspecting the one who was there keeping watch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can cast Sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I can use Misty Step. Can I? To sneak over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could appear right behind him if you wanted to.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I would like to use Misty Step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, "What in the--?" What are you going to do?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I speak for Sauron. And I try to rip his throat out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Rip it out quietly!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a grapple check. So go ahead and roll athletics.

lines.name: DAVIS
lines.text: 16, plus my strength? 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack to try and bite into its throat.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That is 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Roll damage.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Seven points. All right. As you pull the head back and bite into the throat, it's like (gurgling and gasping). You tear a chunk out of its throat, but it's making all these gurgling noises. All the other uruks start rousing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should snap its neck! It's quieter!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what do you want to do?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I have another attack. I'm going to bite his neck again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a creative one, Mozuu.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You see, Mozuu the Chosen means, I choose one thing and I do it over and over again, and that's it. That's it! That's what Sauron said. It is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second time.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: For the love of Pete's Dragon. Okay, that is another seven because that's what happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought he said quietly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you go, (growling) Still alive. Bite down again and pull out another piece. You're taking chunks out of this orc's throat but it's still alive. It's like (yelling), reaching up and grabbing at you now, and it's got the back of your head and is trying to pull you onto the ground. All the other ones are rousing and grabbing their weapons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they know we're here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they up? Are they behind a wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a mountain wall and then an outcropping, and they're on the outcropping. It's hidden, recessed. Below you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Below us! Oh, we're coming in from the mountain. So we can jump down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't take a short rest, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about 25 feet down below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would've been real smart.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: To be fair, they know

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe I should rest while this is going on because I should really rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll cast Sleep on them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you pull out a small pouch--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, with like, sleeping powder and herbs. I untie the top of it and I go, (whoosh).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to sleep too!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, well, I'm sure--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, roll 5d8.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow, 5d8?!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Orc throat makes me sleepy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 5d8 of--? Oh, okay, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 32. So two of the uruk that are getting up out of bed are like, (grunt) reach for their weapons, and are like (grunting, then snoring), and fall immediately back to sleep. The other three, however, are still rousing up from their slumber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The other three are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the best I got.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you all to roll initiative.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: And I'm okay? I did not fall asleep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, because it affects creatures with the lower hit dice, and you actually have a higher hit point value than most of them there. So you weren't affected.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I choose? I choose which one--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It says I choose--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven, all righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21. I need to be a little intelligent bastard from now on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're at the top of the combat round. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take the nearest one with my crossbow and fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he within melee range of him, for sneak attack? Probably not, because he's working on the guy with the throat, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the guy with the throat is the only one that you have sneak attack on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. That does seven points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we hopping off down a cliff, or are we running in toward where they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you. They're about 25 feet down below on this cliff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to stay up on my perch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, stay up on your perch. Got you. You still have a bonus action if you wanted to hide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I can only hide or disengage or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could hide so they can't see you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, well, let them see me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, there you go. So Skak is up in the open. Mozuu, you're up.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. I am going to keep ripping at the man's-- Well, not the man. I'm going to keep ripping him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The uruk, so go ahead for the attack.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, for the love of Pete's Dragon. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It jams the pommel up into your mouth and it hits the roof of your mouth. (gagging) You're now being partially choked by its blade, by the hilt of its blade. So your first strike does not hit it. You want to try a second time?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes. And I have a blade in my mouth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the pommel and hilt jammed up into your jaw and it's trying to keep you at bay.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and jab the pommel in its eye. No, it's not stuck in my mouth, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not at the moment, but you could bite down if you wanted.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: All right, I will. For the-- Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a stronger uruk than you expected and it's currently putting up quite a fight. So that ends your turn, Mozuu?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Ends my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Arby and this group are all going at the same time. So what are you doing, Arby?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to jump down. I'm going to run at them and attack the one that's got him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you leap, make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far? 25 feet down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 feet, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus anything? Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mozuu, make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no way.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: 18 plus-- that's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mozuu, at the last minute, mouth filled with gore and dagger, looks up and sees the shadow encroaching. Kicks away just as you (impact).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Slam down with my maul right as I hit the ground!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You land right on the guy he had. So you slam the maul into the ground, because you don't know where he is. You look around for a moment to look down and realize that your feet are six inches deep into the torso of this once-living orc that has been splattered on the ledge. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll use my second attack to hit another one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are slaughtering today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm screaming as I'm doing it. 24!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Deet de deet de deet. Ooh, ah! 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you land and crush him, you swing wide with your giant maul and it hits one and pins it against the wall. It hits it and slams against the wall. You watch it splatter across the side, destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a gnat, that one! Ha ha, ha!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that'll end your turn, Arby? As that's happening, the orcs are getting up and grabbing their weapons. There are the two still sleeping. As all this is happening, they're (snoring) in the middle of their bedroll. These two other ones that are wounded are going to stand up. They're both going to go after you since you're the one who just arrived aggressively. The first one's going to swing at you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Frustrated DM.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a ten.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The side of their battleaxe, clang! Against your armor, no effect. A natural 20!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's the make-up. There it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a load of shrak, that is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One on a d10, so that's two plus-- You take five points of slashing damage from its critical hit. You deflect it with a chuckle, your giant olog-hai physical self able to withstand such paltry blows. You're called Unstoppable for a reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. Unbreakable. That's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. That ends the orc's turn there, the one you crushed there, the one that's sleeping. Yeah, they don't get a saving throw until they get hit or the spell ends. Fun. All right. There's a third orc right now that's backing away. Hands up, full belly shown, like (heavy breathing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill the weak one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, no no!" Eden, your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will jump on the weak one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an acrobatics check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Check? 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, all right. You land on it without issue and you actually reduce the damage from the impact to two. You only take two points of bludgeoning damage from the fall as you land on top of it. Go ahead and roll a d4. Add your strength modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d4, add strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh god, which one is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three, plus strength is one. So four!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently pinned onto the ground underneath you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take my quarterstaff and-- like churning butter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is considered prone, so you have advantage on your attacks against it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good, because that was a two. And that's a natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit! Okay, so roll your first attack damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: d8, seven, plus four. 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, seven times two, because it was a critical. So 14.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 14 plus four is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the first hit, as you jam down, you go to stir it. You hit right at the base of the skull and the neck breaks immediately. But you feel like you still have to go through the motion so you still stir inside, even though it's not living. The body's limp and being pushed around in a circle. You're like, (yelling in disgust).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's it look like, being pushed around in a circle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling) About like that. So that's your first strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, is he dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. He's very dead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Orc physiology is not my specialty. Do I see other orcs? Uruks, around me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two sleeping and there is one that was first struck by you with your crossbow, that was wounded, but it's still standing and its blade's out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get one more attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will move to that one and hit him. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's your movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, yes. You would have enough, because you are quicker than the other. So you have enough speed to get right up to him. Go ahead and make your second attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so speedy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not with advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's probably a miss. It's a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. This one sees you crush his friend and stir him up a bit, and prepares itself. As you rush toward, darts out of the way and dodge-rolls beyond your attack. No effect.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a wraith! It's a grave-walker! They can disappear at will!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, that ends Eden's turn. Skak, you're up first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The last one that remains un-asleep: crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Is he now within melee of him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 17, so I'll use my sneak attack. 12, that's an eight. 12, 16, 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It clutches it, gets the axe up to its side, and you see it, with its final bit of strength, trying to strike a blow toward your olog friend over there, but crumples to the ground and bleeds out from its abdomen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Skak!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Now, quiet-- I'm looking at you-- quietly kill the other, and leave one for questioning!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill the other? There's two asleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk over and use my maul and smash down on one of the ones that's sleeping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an attack with advantage. It's an auto-crit because it is incapacitated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, 16 plus eight, so that's definitely going to hit, and it's not a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is a crit. It's an auto-crit because it's right there. Actually, you wouldn't even have to roll because, when it's incapacitated. No, attack rolls have advantage, you're right. And within five feet, it's a critical hit. So yeah, you did hit and you have a crit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Re-roll that. That'll do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! 20 plus five, 25!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snoring) (impact) Scattered. Gallagher performance. All of you are like (splatter).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A good kill.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one sleeping now has this section of hand that slopped onto its head. Pulls it in, cuddles with the disembodied orc arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sucks the thumb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sucking somebody else's thumb! That's so gross!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I get down? I'm tiny!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here! I'll catch you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll catch you, just come down. Oh, wait! I have a blanket. Let's spread it out and we'll hold it, and you can jump down on the blanket.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't let me fall!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, of course not! Right as he jumps, I let go and start picking my nose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no. Oh, hey! 17! Trickster rogues, man, okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you leap off and watch one of three taut points on it vanish, you flap your arms really fast to try and maneuver through the air. You manage to hit some tension on their side and roll off. You only suffer three points of bludgeoning damage as you roll on the ground. As you land, I want you to roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that all about? Oh, I know what it is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's not good. That's a six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as you roll and land, the sleeping powder seems to have worn off. The one that's on the ground, clutching and sucking on the thumb of the disembodied uruk arm goes, (sniffing and grunting) (confused noises) (cry of alarm).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grab him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not to kill him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No! Question him!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We will question him, and we will question him in the patented way we always question individuals, when we all speak as one!

lines.name: SAM, LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: As one!

lines.name: SAM, DARIN, LAURA
lines.text: Don't bite his throat.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You, strong people, grapple him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will grapple him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 19. As you go to grab, he goes (yelling), pulls away. You can attempt to make another, if you want. You get two attacks. You can make one per attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right. This one is, it's an athletics check? 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. Yeah, no, he's like, (grunting), pushes away from you twice. This slimy little orc is now freaked out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start grabbing at him like it's a piece of paper blowing in the wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check. It's like (slurping sounds).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Athletics, or what? Athletics is ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Boop, boop, boop! It keeps slipping out of your grasp and it's crawling on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. Okay, yeah, that'll do it. It slips past each one, crawling on the ground, (heavy breathing) (clunk) "Ugh!" You get the ankle and you pull it back in. Slides onto his back and is like, (panicked yelling) underneath this giant olog body, covered in armor, that's towering over it. Looking up at you, Arby, like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to ask you some questions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All together, right? One, two--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: --Three. Who do you serve? We are the Forcs! Who do you serve? Not meaning food! Because we are the Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somebody make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will intimidate. Natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (softly) Two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Are you serious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After this display, the uruk on the ground goes, (bursts into laughter). "What is this? What, "the Forcs? Really? (giggling) Just kill me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we have to kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Give him pain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pain?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I lift him up, hanging by his ankle. Do we want to use him as a piñata?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's multicultural. Sure! I'll take out my length of chain and sort of start whipping him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shrieking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who do you serve? Who do you work for?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My! Name's! Borg! Please, stop it! I'm Borg!" LAURA & DARIN: Borg. Borg? Borg borg.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who sent you? Where are you from? Who do you work for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're looking for Ur-Gram.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know Ur-Gram!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do! Where's Ur-Gram?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stuttering) "I could tell you. I could show you!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right! I drop him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just know, Ur-Gram is strange. He's a fanatic. Bit "of a creepy individual."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we take a short rest while we talk about him? Can I sit down? I'm going to sit down and listen to what he's saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This uruk, which at a close glance is small, it's borderline goblin in how thin and tiny it is, sits up on his feet. (wheezing) "A fanatic, Ur-Gram is. Near death once, he was! Now works for "some tark who walks like the wraiths do. The Bright Lord, he is. Marks all his gobs with his "hand, he does. I don't question, though. Ur-Gram can break any of us. I've seen it, I have."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He can't break me. I'm unbreakable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's good."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You said he works for the Bright Lord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just some stupid man-filth."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pig-skin!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Soft-skin!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Man-swine!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure, those are all good ones.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: What other ones can we use?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Man-filth! Man-beast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I already said man-filth."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Now, what other insults could we use, all together, in one voice? In our traditional way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please, don't. Borg is asking you."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You said creepy? Who's creepier than the Forcs? You can answer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No one?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Correct answer.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's two things I know. We are the creepiest, and that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whimpering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So Ur-Gram works for the Bright Lord and can bend anyone to his will?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, didn't bend me. Didn't ask."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll show you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you show us in 30 minutes? Because I want to take a short break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure, take your rest."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we rest, what if they send a patrol up here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll pretend that we're the guards that we just killed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You lead us to Ur-Gram, we'll rest for a minute, and then when you lead us we'll let you leave!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use him as a pillow as I take a short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to bind his hands first, and then I'm going to stick some dirty garments hanging off of Eden in his mouth, to gag him up.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Every Forc, as has been proven by science, has five forky things. We are but four! If you join us, we will be five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but then we'd be--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: --the Fircs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't work as well. If you join us, you could be my pillow as long as you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled whimpering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on. I take out the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fluff him up and lay down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelps of pain) You break a few bones in the process.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I should gag him back up. I walk back over to Eden and I tear off a bit of cloth near the groin area. Yeah, I put it back in. Okay, should we take a short rest?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys all take a short rest. You can use any hit dice that are currently unspent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got to use them all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because you have those hit dice once per day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back up at full.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get your ki back. You get your action surge back.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Almost full.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Almost full, not quite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At the end of this rest, as you're laying back, you hear this silent whimpering as Borg's like (whimpering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay, Borg-borg.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, pet names.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he said his name twice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pet names for our captive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lead us to Ur-Gram.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need to get up first."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got a gag in your mouth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (muffled)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now hold on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blah! I need to get up first!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let him up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I sit up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gasping and heavy breathing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're very comfy. I start taking his ropes off him as I pat his little head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, why are you untying his hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, because I thought he needs to walk?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're on his hands!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't understand what the problem is.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now, I've made him a nice bit of jewelry for his wrists. Let's leave it on so he feels like he's part of the group.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I tie his hands back together. In front!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I undo his feet then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those were never tied.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys continue eastward under the cover of night, having crossed over the apex of this mountain range, you descend down the treacherous paths and cliffs below. A few hours downward, continuing with the pushing of Borg ahead of you, he begins to continuously glance out in the darkness ahead of you until eventually, you come around one bend through this small valley path that's been carved through years and years of heavy rains and wind that have burrowed this small walkway through these big cliff-sides. You turn around the corner and you can see, immediately, about a dozen or so dotted lights in the distance, the dark. Maybe a quarter-mile away. There, Borg goes, "That there! That's where he is! That's where Ur-Gram and the tark have been preparing!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the Bright Lord down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know! I've only had to go outside of it!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You've never been inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well I've been inside, but they let me in! Don't think they're going to do that for you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a password or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do all of you wear special hats or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean--" He looks down at himself and looks around. "They gave us these." He tugs at the tunic that he has under his ramshackle, piecemeal armor. There's this soft grey material that has a dull grey handprint that's pulled across the front. He goes, "Maybe this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty. I could wear that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're big.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: You said the other uruk were marked by this Bright Lord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, he gives them like, a--"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Does it leave a print on their face?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't think so."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to give it a try?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I walk over to Mozuu and slap him as hard as I can across the face.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: How many hit points do I lose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your strength modifier is five? You take six points of bludgeoning damage to the face, as your jaw actually disconnects from one side and (cracking sound).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (indistinct)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't understand you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what the mark looks like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make an insight check to see if he's lying? Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, he's totally lying. He has no idea. He watched you slap the shit out of your friend and is amused by it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got an idea. What if we untie him and he brings us in as new recruits to Ur-Gram?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll get an audience with him and we cut his head off! And then we bring it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can hear you!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're not going to cut

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, oh!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, the Man-eater. The Face-eater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could do that! I could help you in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we'll cut you in on the spoils.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good idea!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going to get a lot of money for this mission, and we'll give you one half.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's me, man! I actually have deception for once!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's like, "That's very generous. So then, to Ur-Gram? Come on."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: To Ur-Gram! May I fix my jaw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I can fix it! I'm a medic.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's cocked. 11 plus medicine? 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? It takes a minute, but eventually (cracking). It's sore. It's swollen. Your face looks disproportionate.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I feel alive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His robes off? His

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make him naked!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He needs to have a costume on, for the ruse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember, you're bringing us in because we're new recruits. You're here to see Ur-Gram. No questions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ferocious warriors, we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The moment you betray us, we will kill you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Painfully.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, good to know. Follow me!" Begins to carefully dart around. You guys progress for about 20 or so minutes before you reach the very base of this mountain. It's now evened out and you're in this valley, where this small fortress is. The closer you get, I want you to make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 here as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Darin?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Plus what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's toward the bottom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys can see, on the other side of this wide valley, where the torchlights encircle a fenced, walled encampment, a single ramshackle watchtower marks the center of the interior of this large, sharpened pike-like wall. The back half of the wall is buttressed against the mountain base, across the valley from you, vanishing into a large cavern. So it's not a full encirclement. You see the wall encircles around the base of the mountain and each side ends at the mountain. There's an actual natural cavern that the base of it hides in shadow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a nice camp. They've got a real nice camp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Location, location, location.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But do they have grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've heard this sound before. It's kept you up at night, whenever the caragors in their cages were particularly rambunctious. It sounds like a caragor. As soon as you hear it, you also hear a (alert yelp). A second one, not far from it, goes (snuffling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's caragors!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but like, near you. Maybe 40 feet from you, at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there trees around us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No trees. You're in Mordor right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, just thought I'd ask. You know, some ashen trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, there are jagged rocks. Part of the terrain itself is a series of broken shale and large rock faces that jut out of the ground from seismic activity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we hide behind rocks? It's caragors.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You hear caragors?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, like real big-sounding ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prepare to fight! And I hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hide? No, we should sneak past them!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's true, we should. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you watch as Skak disappears behind a rock. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I also try to duck behind a rock.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to sit here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to duck behind a rock and wait for one to show its face around a rock, and then I'm going to hit it with my maul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we try to go past them?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You watch as Arby nods, follows suit, right behind where Skak is. The rock's almost the size of Arby, so you see this outline of Arby clutching this rock and trying to act quiet as the armor (clanking).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look and see if we can make it past them! You, stick your head out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I will stealthily see if I can see any caragors. Move out, look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! 25!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sneaky sneaky!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you climb a little bit of the rock face on one side of this pathway that's carved into the mountain base here, you glance up. You can see the faint bit of moonlight that breaks through one of the nearby clouds. You can see the outer rim of two fully-grown caragors that are currently walking, maybe 15 feet from each other, a dual hunting scenario. They're both like (sniffing and grunting) on the ground, and they're smelling for any sort of possible prey that might be in the vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi! We need to distract them somehow. Does anyone have any meat on them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I have a bell!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A bell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would distract?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's a bell! It makes noise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bell clanging) The bell is now ringing in her hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Throw the bell!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw the bell as far away as I can!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The caragors at this point (snarling). They both go jumping and leaping in toward where the source of the bell sound was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw the bell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god. Please throw it a mile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bell arcs behind where you guys were.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, no, 15. Because it's not a saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear it ping (crushing). With an impact, you see rocks get thrown, as it scrapes across the ground and it tears where the sound source was, it sits there, tearing at it. The other one comes right up to the edge to inspect inside. Right over where you are, it hasn't quite noticed you right now as you guys are all standing still, the bell is quickly being noticed to not be anything fleshy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look up. Is it like right above the head?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, maybe, five feet above you right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I could take my maul and go like

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could use Mage Hand to create a better distraction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Too late.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an attack. You have advantage on this strike since it's unaware of your position.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughing) Aw. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (roars)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it saw us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get a second attack because you did take the action on this one. And at this point, the other one spins around from where the bell was, hearing the pained sound of its ally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage, all righty. So, as it's gearing up over the side, you take the maul and slam it again. This time it moves its head to the side and it hits the side of its neck. It's a heavy hit, and it takes the brunt of it, but it's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's so much bigger than I thought it was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think you were thinking it was like a dog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, because you didn't play an orc in the game, so you don't know that these things are really powerful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really terrible.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: But they can be defeated by a bell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a giant liger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And on that note, I would like everybody to roll initiative, please, as these two caragor are now bearing down on you in this ravine. Oh, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got more of them than they have. It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we should try to run.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah, these guys don't seem very fast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, only four-legged.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Greyhounds of death. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Mozuu, you're up first. There's the one that's up behind you on the path, maybe about 15, 20 feet from you, and there's the one that's right above the edge right now that she slammed twice in the face. What are you going to do?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Thunderous Smite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you pull forth your war pick, and you're going to go ahead and strike which one?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: The one that was closest to Arby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Or I should go for the other one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to try and make your way up either Arby, or climb part of the cliff side. Up to you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do you mind if I climb you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not a bit.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm going to climb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's either a one or a 20.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I don't know what that is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 20!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, it's a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, snap, okay. So, using Arby's body as a ramp, you begin to leap up from shoulder to back to shoulder, the top of her head, and jump in the air, warpick in the sky as you scream to bring it bearing down on the first caragor before you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: (yelling) I speak for Sauron!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) All righty, so, make an attack roll against it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits! Go ahead and roll for this.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I think it's a 1d8 plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yes, 1d8 plus three, and then you add an additional 2d6 thunder damage to the target.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's eight, and the six, that is three, and that is a one. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. As you slam the war pick right into the front of its snout, it jams into one nostril and tears through across the side of its face, releasing this gout of dark purplish-red blood, and as the impact hits, there's a burst of energy. The sheer force of your anger as you scream in its face scares it back, and it blows about ten feet behind you and is knocked prone. It rolled a natural four plus four, that's eight. And I believe your spell DC is 11, right?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes it is. Oh yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's trying to snap around and get its feet any sort of purchase to get back up on to the ground, but currently it's open.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: The Forcs are a powerful team.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't forc around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Okay, so, Skak, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Skak. Because it's laying prone, I probably can't see it from below, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you'd have get up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll aim to the other one that turned at the sound of pain, and I will use my crossbow to shoot at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's terrible. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. Okay. That does not hit. You turn around and you fire and it--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (whimpers) Bonus action! Hide!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you move around the rock where you are and try and hide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, fair enough. 18. On stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know. All right. That ends your turn, it's now their turn. So the one that was knocked prone gets up off the ground. Ten feet away, it still has enough movement as you're standing now on the shoulders of Arby. It's going to go ahead and-- Let's see.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: And we put on a big coat and pretend we're one person. And we sneak into a movie theatre.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a five-foot step back and goes into a 15-foot leap right towards you. It's a deadly leap. (snarls) It lunges towards you.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Mm-hmm. This was a wonderful game. Thank you for letting me play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I need both Mozuu and Arby to make strength or dexterity saving throw, your choice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get its attention, you can do it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You succeed, you do not. All right, so. Here we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All the dice come out. Just all the dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 points of bludgeoning and slashing damage to you, Mozuu, and you are knocked prone as it lands on top of you, knocking you off of Arby's shoulders. You are now on the ground with it on top of you going (snarls). And it's tearing and biting at you as you are currently pinned to the floor.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: He's trying to rip out my throat? Sure is poetic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, it's partially standing on you now, its hind legs are up on your back and it's using you to hold itself as it's currently putting all of its weight on Mozuu. The other one that was shot at by Skak is going to go ahead and rush forward and it's going to go ahead and make a deadly leap as well. Let's see, all that going on with that space it's going to have to go after Eden. I need you to go ahead and make a strength or dexterity saving throw, your choice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll choose dexterity, and that's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21, all right. Okay, you take six points of bludgeoning and slashing damage together, and you are not knocked prone. It doesn't pin you in the space. You just manage to pull out of the way, but it's right up in your face now and your back's against the rock that he's hiding behind. There's your friends and the other caragor right behind you over your shoulders, and this one is right in front of you right now, slashing and snarling at you. That's going to end their turn. Arby, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to spin around and try to hit the one that's standing on me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's the one you've hit before, so go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Ooh, 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw. Dang. Plus seven plus five is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so that first hit slams into its side. You hit it again, you hear the crunch. One shoulder blade seems to almost buckle a little bit. It's looking pretty hurt but it's still standing there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try to hit it again. That's a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, all righty. And with that, you slam up your maul a second time. It actually catches it right underneath the jaw and forces its head to snap up so fast that its spine seems to break into place, and with a (whines) it falls limp, the entirety of its weight sliding off of your shoulders and onto Mozuu, who is now prone and pinned underneath it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I've gotten the most damage of this entire game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eden! Do you want me to try to hit that one too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to action surge and try to run up to the other one and attack it too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Action surge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. Taking a little bit there, shoving it off to the side, you rush up to the one that's right in the face of Eden. It's a quick jaunt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're so powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you kidding me?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Double ones both times!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, that's seven points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, seven points of damage. You rush up and swing at it. This time, it brings its head back and manages to deflect some of the blow with the side of its face; not quite doing as much damage as you'd like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, natural 20 on the next hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make up for that! There you go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 points of damage! So, while it deflects the first blow, as it turns its head back to strike at you, you put your foot up and hold it right in its jaw to keep it from getting away. You use that to aim it up and whack right up the side of its temple. It rings its bell and you watch as it pulls away, the slobber and blood dripping from its jaws, shaking its head back and forth from the pain you just inflicted. I believe that ends your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End of Arby's turn brings it to you, Eden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (growling) I will attack relentlessly! 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is five points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Relentless damage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get two attacks and then you can use your Flurry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got it. So, second attack doesn't hit. It's 12. So I can't use my Flurry of Blows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Flurry of Blows!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you get two more attacks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's worse. And 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 just barely hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's probably dextrous, too. I'm going to choose that it can't take reactions until the end of my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mozuu, you're up. Currently prone and pinned under the dead body of a caragor.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: May I call for help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you may.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I would like to do that. You thought I was going to say something else, but I would like to call: Hello? Might I have a bit of aid, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to attempt to pull your way out, or are you just waiting for someone to help you?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm waiting for someone to help me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're holding your action for someone to aid.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I've been beaten up a lot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see him under this giant caragor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear and see, out of the corner of your eye. You especially see it because you're right behind the rock and you see his head and shoulders are right there like, "Help!"

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Excellent. The person who isn't the strongest! This'll be fun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm on my way!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Skak's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (panicked noises) Can I not help him at all? I pop back up out of hiding. Can I take aim with the crossbow again? As a bonus, can I smash a poison vial on one of my arrows to make it a poisoned arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to poison a weapon. It's more of a preparation thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll keep that in mind. Crossbow! Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh shit! Roll your dice and then add the modifiers after you double it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus your sneak attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it sneak attack? Is he within melee of the other ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they've both been bashing it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent. Oh god. 16. 24.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're supposed to double your dice, all of your dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 26. That one's supposed to be doubled too, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The caragor turns, opening its jaw to snap over Arby and it goes right in the back of the throat, up into the brain and it collapses to the ground, no longer moving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, are you okay, Mozuu?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Mozuu?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I am a talking caragor!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I walk over and try to push the caragor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're sore, you're crushed, you're sweaty and covered in blood, but you're now standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See! That wasn't so bad!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is our prisoner still around, or did he run away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I forgot we even had him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, perception! 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. He is quite a ways down the walkway sprinting away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could catch him!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's take off after him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to sprint after him using Step of the Wind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy panting) About a minute later or so, you catch up right behind him and he's within grasp of you. He hasn't noticed you, he's just eyes on the prize right towards the fortress.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I grab the top of his skull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check to grapple him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Athletics? 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. You grab him by the back of the head and he gets yanked out from under his feet and slams into the ground. You're still clutching him. You pick him up. He's dangling now from your giant olog mitts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can't run from the Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was running from the caragors! Self-preservation, mate!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That makes sense. All right, we'll wait here for the others and then we follow this plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're on our side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I trust you implicitly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't worry about anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see if he's killing him or having a chat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope! Two!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see him grabbing him by the head and pulling him in and you see a bit of a struggle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should probably shoot him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's killing him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I nock an arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're so terrible!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's terrible! Eight. Nine. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're holding him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I trust you implicitly. We are in this together 100%.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry, we've got this! All right, we're going to make our way inside."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Friends. Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heal him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can! I will use my medical kit to stabilize him! I pull out the arrow! No, don't do this to me! Come on, fight! You can come back! I spit into the wound, I close it with my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to ask you right now to make an initiative roll to see how fast you are at healing him versus how fast he's bleeding out from the wound.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cough) He rolled a three.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bock! Bock-Bock! What's his name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Borg-Borg!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Borg-Borg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just Borg."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Borg, I thought I had lost you. I don't know what happened. All I can say is: I'm sorry and it will never happen again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys approach as Eden is cradling this freshly bandaged goblin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we kill him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you fixed him up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did you do that?! He's our ticket in!

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think you can still trust us, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or you can take that as a sign of things to come if you do it again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Prepare to feel the-- oh, not terrible! 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Right. Point making. I'm good. All right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boy, don't you call me point making! All right. Inside. Wait. Should we make him look a little better? You almost killed him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does anybody have any lipstick? And some rouge?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were going to make him pretty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a robe.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I have oil. In certain cases, I'm just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have some bagpipes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a crowbar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have a bagpipe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like to play music sometimes, that's all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we're good, let's just get on with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you guys slowly begin to encroach upon the outer elements of this fortress, the points of torchlight burning in these braziers along the top side of it, you can see guards walking back and forth along the edges, shortbows at the side, nocked and ready in case any sign of danger happens. You can see a front-- actually, for you guys that are closest, go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as you all stare off and it's about as much as you can make out. You, however, Skak, looking ahead, you can see: one, there's a main entrance. There's two large, eight-foot-wide doors that are currently closed on the north side of the wall. You also see what happens to be a muck-covered mud hole that's towards the south side, where the wall meets the mountain, where you can see it's a little swampy and it looks like some of this thick muck and mud meets up to the side of the wall there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the doors lie ahead but I see off to the side a little quagmire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like mucky, muddier earth and liquid--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we could take a bath!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could, yes, or we could see if perhaps there's a way under the wall.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do you know what that is? Have you been through there before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I've seen it, aye."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Have you ever seen anyone go in or out of there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not intentionally. It's the shrak hole." (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I could show you." (coughs) Its wrapping is all around the face and one eye-- it was already swollen from earlier and is now-- he's a wrecked-looking goblin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened to your neck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we either go in through the front door--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or the back door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Oh yes, literally! Oh jeez! Oh gosh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, shrak happens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it does. Shrak yeah! Okay, do we send him first? No, because if he gets in, he runs away. I'm just saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll go first. Right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one of us?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Who's the most beaten up? Who's been through absolute hell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: There's two things I know. I'm going first--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: And that's it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm going first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go through that shrak hole!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So I want you guys to all make stealth checks to make your way around that hole without being seen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're stealthing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, and that's disadvantage for you, Arby, unfortunately. Because you have heavy armor on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (high-pitched) Oh man! But I rolled so well on that first one!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (high-pitched) Well, roll a second time!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: So the roll plus dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a stealth check.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh, five.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five total?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: It was a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! As you guys quietly make your way over to the shrak hole, you approach the base of the gate there and you hear a voice above you go, "Hey! What are you doing?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonk! Say something!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look up and there's three archers that all have their bows notched on you, going, "What "the hell are you--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Brick, say something!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. We're gathering for the alchemist. Getting some more prime shrak for his boomy balls! "Yeah!" He's going to attempt to make a deception-- oh, not bad, actually. Let's see if they-- rolling against myself here. "All right. Who are them?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're the Forcs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's the Forcs?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's what you eat with!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We work for Ur-Gram!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them starts whispering to the other one and the one that he's whispering to nods and goes and grabs one of the torches and starts going over towards one of the unlit braziers. You've seen these before; they're used usually as a beacon, a warning, a signal for any sort of undue--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go through the shrak hole right away! Fast, charging in!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The guy walking towards the brazier? Yeah, but there are three longbows above us and we have the low ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why we have to go through the shrak hole, as fast as we can!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kill him so he doesn't light it, then we go into the poop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I eye the guy walking with the torch towards the brazier. Does he look like he intends to light said brazier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks like he intends to light it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will draw very quickly the crossbow and try and put one in while he's not looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rolling with sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How high is the wall, Matt?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it a surprise attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it is not a surprise attack. It's probably about 15 feet high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But is it a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You weren't-- oh, you were pretty stealthed, the rest weren't. So yeah, it is now a sneak attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 16 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 to hit. Yeah, that hits! The archer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the one that's walking towards the brazier falls off the wall on the side and slams into the mud there. And the other two archers immediately go--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And they both pull and they're going to both fire arrows down. One of them is going to fire at you-- actually they're both going to fire at you because you killed their friend. You revealed yourself. They suck though-- that's an 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That will miss!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And a ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses as well!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you duck out on both sides and they both go for secondary arrows and begin running towards the brazier themselves now. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! You should hit them too because they're going to light it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to jump up onto the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use my step of the wind which doubles my jump distance. Distance, does that mean height?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah. But horizontal distance-- we'll say height for this. What's your strength modifier?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four-- one. My strength modifier is one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are an olog, you barely get your fingers up on the top. Go ahead and make a strength saving throw to try and pull yourself up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (scoffs) Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You drop back down. It's just too high.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any rocks around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check if you want to.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: We did take a rest. Did we regain any spells we use?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's a long rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 12? You find a small rock. In your hand, it's really small.

lines.name: LAURA

There we go! That is a 24 to hit.

lines.name: DARIN

lines.text: Eight? (laughs) You slam it against the wall. It slides down and hits the ground. You hear this horrible crunching sound as a number of previously unbroken bones are now freshly broken in the dead body. You have another attack if you want to walk up and try it again.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: Well, as you dive in, it pushes you out the other side. You get shoved out, plopped out, covered in shrak. And you look around, immediately you can see, as you wipe your eyes off the shrak, everybody is now starting to look around at the signal and begin to grab their weapons and start preparing for an incursion. You dive into it. You get halfway in-- this is a very small space underneath and you're a very large olog. I'm going to need you to make either an athletics check or an acrobatics check to try and push through. Your choice.

lines.name: MATT

You push through and watch as the bottom of the wall splinters and breaks, but you manage to make your way through and now, you stand up behind Mozuu, a good number of feet taller than him, also covered in shrak and you both now look around at this chaos happening. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA

lines.text: All right. You dive in. The space has been opened, thankfully. You follow through. They paved the path.

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.text: It breaks off the armor. They're both firing arrows down at you. All right, so what are you guys doing? You glide underneath as they fire at you. You slip under. You're back there with Borg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dives in, like slowly wades into it (groans) and goes under and pushes his way through without an issue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys get up on the other side, you can now see about 40 to 50 various uruk have now gathered at the base of the wall where you're standing. They're all armored and ready, their weapons are drawn and you are completely surrounded on the interior of this wall. Nothing but liquid shrak at your back, as you all stand there but they're all keeping at bay. You watch as a hand comes up behind the crowd and goes, "Hold!" Everyone was like-- they are ready to tear at you but they begin to part at the center and you watch with heavy steps as an olog-hai approaches with a giant, mutated underbite with tusks that reach up past the nostril. The eyes peek through from heavily scarred muscle tissue where a face once existed, but has since been torn and not healed very well over. You see, clutching a giant greataxe in its grasp, what you assume to be Ur-Gram the Face-Eater, who's approached and goes, "Who? Who enters

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.text: "The Bright Lord, you say?"

lines.name: DARIN

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you see Ur-Gram is taken aback by this response and glances over his shoulders. He steps back and you hear a voice from behind him go, "Let me see this orc. Bring him "before me." And as Ur-Gram steps aside, you see a human male standing with long, somewhat-tattered dark hair, beard towards the base of the chin, wearing leather and hide armor and bits of chainmail beneath a dark cloak with a single long blade extended to one side. All the rest of the various uruks around the area separate and back away. As they do, you see a familiar flash in their eyes, that strange gray-white light that you saw when you first had your fortress attacked. The human man walks forward. "You say you came this far for the Bright Lord. Then come. Stand before "me. Be marked as you say your request."

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) He's been chosen.

lines.text: You see spiritual energy pull out of him and you see for a brief instant, a wraith-like form of some long-dead elf that marks the exterior of his body. As the hand reaches forward, this voice echoes around. "Come. May you join the rest of this army." Takes the hand and places it against the side of Mozuu's face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I scream out, No! And run forward and try to tackle him. Manswine! (laughter)

lines.text: All righty.

Your large olog-hai form (heavy footsteps) and slam with your shoulder into this tark. He goes flying off, spinning in the air and landing, barely catching himself as he skids back about ten feet or so. Looks up at you and still the wraith form is on the outside. The eyes flash with this vibrant scary white light and the wraith form fits back into the body. As the tark stands to his feet, the blade at his side and goes, "Very well. So you've chosen death."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.text: This is the one to follow.

lines.name: MATT

lines.text: (evil laughter) Perfect. All right, that ends Mozuu's turn. Eden, you're up, having just thrown the bolt back at Skak.

lines.name: LAURA

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't win this fight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not with

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone's turning into bad guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, technically, we

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's right. Oh, I don't know what to do! I can't beat that guy. He's a wraith! I'm going to--

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, that's a 12! Rolled really low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I dodge it. It's all the shrak on me, it slips off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unbreakable, even.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unbreakable!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Back to the top. It's now Arby and the gravewalker's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you rush, maul swinging in the air. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! That's 11!
