lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're tricky, you! I try to hit him again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! That's only 11, again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The second swing goes wide and for a second, you're sure you made contact but in the space where the hammer goes, you watch as the gravewalker stands back into place. "You sow chaos "and invite it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know what you mean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Bow or crumple before your Bright Lord. The choice matters not, for death has already found me "once and lost." And he's going to go ahead and attempt a wraith stun attack against you. That is 23 to hit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take ten points of radiant damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my troll's endurance! And I'm going to take that down by ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By ten? So it hits you and you resist the damage but I still need you to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no. 21!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You feel the impact, the wraith energies, but your physical form, being a tough olog-hai, you resist the stunning effect of the strike and push through it. No stun on you whatsoever. And then he's going to go ahead and follow up with two more attacks with Urfael, as the bow's been put by the side. He's going to swing twice with the blade against you. That is a 15? It just slides off your armor. Second strike, that's cocked. Natural one.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unmoved at this threatening presence that's looking up at you, like it's only an inevitability.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a boss fight, pig-skin! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So that's going to go ahead and end their turn. Skak, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I serve the Bright Master! Can I hold my attack and ask for one of the large uruks or uruk-hais to pick me up and throw me above the wall so I can take a crossbow shot at fleeing Eden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks at you with a nod. Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all must serve, answer the call! Yeah, that's going to be a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19! The olog picks you up and gives you an alley-oop into the air. Yeah, easily enough, you arc up. Make an acrobatics check to try and land your feet on the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You land on the edge of the wall and you glance up, just passing, you can see Eden darting away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We cannot flee!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an attack!

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, I'll allow it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use my troll's endurance to reduce that by 11 points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So crossbow bolt catches you in the back of the shoulder blades, right where the spine meets them. Your body tenses for a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forcs don't run. They stick in meat and they stay there forever. And I turn around and I run back into the shrak hole! (laughing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so when you get to your turn, you're bolting back. All right. So Mozuu, it's back up to your turn.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Can I hold it until the actions are done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, pretty much everyone else is gone.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Can I speak to the Bright Lord? I said I heard the voice of Sauron. I lied. I never heard anything, but I will hear your voice if you would speak to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I still have a hold of his blade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Can I try to smack it with himself and say stop hitting yourself! Stop hitting yourself!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. All right. Go ahead and make-- this would be an athletics versus athletics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23. As you attempt to do it, he pulls the blade from your grasp. Cuts your hand a little bit but nothing too major.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to try to attack him then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have one more attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 hits!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven plus five is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 12 points of damage. This time, the gravewalker gets taken off his feet a little bit. He rolls a little bit, just around the side and gets back up to his feet, maybe five feet, almost ten feet from you. Blade's still out, looks at you, looks at the surrounding scenarios. Seems to become somewhat impressed by the fact that you're still fighting in the midst of such immeasurable danger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 14 points of damage added back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can opt to not resist it if you'd like to.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That is 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to resist it or you want to let it happen?

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm on board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then that being the case, the brand burns in the side of your face. You watch as Mozuu's eyes flare with a vibrant energy. And as it fades, you now see that indeed, this prophecy you spoke earlier seems to be true.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I'm truly chosen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are now. As the brand is there, you glance back and see the pittance that is the existence of your previous allies. And the Bright Lord, as you stand up, goes, "Kill for me." And looks back towards Arby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not me, we're on the same team!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Right, buddy!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Betrayers unite!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 23.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that hits me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 19.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That is 11 points of piercing damage and seven points of piercing damage. Both arrows slam into your armor; you can feel the plates break and crumble. These are not normal arrows, not with the strength that they're being tossed at you. That's going to end the gravewalker's turn. Skak, you're up. You can see Eden running back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to try and hide first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Does it up my-- if I'm from a hidden position?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, if you can manage to hide and move and he's not aware of where you are? I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will use my bonus action to try and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So make a stealth check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check if you like, Eden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So right as he's running, he glances up and catches you. Skak, make your attack. No sneak attack on this one, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn! Oh, that's pretty good. 25.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits, but I will catch that shit. I mean, catch that shrak and throw it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have any ki left?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It doesn't say I need ki!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To throw it back, you need to spend a ki.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I see. I can catch it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 12 points of damage, and I will use fury of the small to add five extra damage to it, so 17.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's 1d10 plus nine. So I rolled an eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as he's running, and just catches it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not fair. It's not fair! I can only do that once a day!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ending Skak's turn. Mozuu, you're up.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you're real sorry. Chosen.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: I leap at Arb-Uruk and attempt to rip her throat out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make an athletics check against Arb-Uruk. You make an athletics check as well, as it's opposed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no. Athletics. Oh no, he gets me. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Okay. 16 plus three. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19. Armor class is 18. Roll a d4 plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That is a five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take five points of piercing damage as Mozuu begins biting chunks out of your throat.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Do I get another attack or is leaping the attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll consider leaping as part of it.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: That's a good thing. Sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Eden, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have enough movement to get under the shrak hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you ran and then came right back, you come up from underneath and you're out of the shrak hole and you see now Mozuu latched onto Arb-Uruk, biting into the throat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to attack Mozuu.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or is the Bright--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get to the Bright Lord. You're pretty fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Attack Mozuu!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll attack Mozuu. I choose Mozuu the Chosen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mozuu!

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Mozuu!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to hit? That hits Mozuu, I think.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Oh yes, I'm at 18. Otherwise known as, ow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight plus four. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 12 points of bludgeoning damage as out of nowhere, Eden rushes forward and slams you in the side of the body. Almost knocking you off of Arb-Uruk but not quite strong enough to do so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A second attack. 11 plus seven. 18 to hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Roll damage again!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two plus four. So that's six more points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six more points of bludgeoning damage. And you have your bonus action still, if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! One more hit. This is an open-handed hit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe so, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No good. That's a 13 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13. The third and final hit, you manage to deflect it with your with your arm. It makes no impact there. Ending Eden's turn. Up to you and the gravewalker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I grab a hold of Mozuu and rip him off me and then hit the gravewalker with him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So make an athletics check and you make an athletics check as well.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you tear him off. Go ahead and make an attack roll. You don't get the proficiency bonus on this but you still get your strength bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just my strength modifier? 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits the gravewalker! His AC is 17! I'll say for this one, roll a d6 and add your strength modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill the tark! For the glory of the uruk!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't get to reroll your damage roll because he's not considered--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not a two-handed weapon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure! You know what, sure! I'll let him be a two-handed weapon. Yeah, I'll allow it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So ten points of bludgeoning damage to both you and the gravewalker.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Guess what?

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gravewalker takes the hit, looks up at you. He's going to go ahead and make one strike with Urfael. That is 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! It hits me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take eight points of slashing damage. And that is a 22 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. It gets me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! I'm unconscious!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're unconscious? All right, as you fall unconscious and collapse to the ground, he reaches down and grasps the side of your face and you feel this urge of energy come up from underneath and as your eyes flare open, you see the burning, vibrant eyes of the wraith within the gravewalker say, "Stand and join me." Do you want to resist or not? Make a will save to resist, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try and resist it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit! 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do. Brought back to the brink, there the gravewalker stands ahead of you. As you resist, he goes, "Fine. I gave you a choice." Spins the blade around and takes you out from that point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dead dead?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't get turnt! And it was worth it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Skak, your turn, up on the edge of the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and resist the domination? That I'm under the hold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Then I will gladly take a-- can I jump down from the wall? No, crossbow. Is he within melee of anybody for sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. Crossbow right at him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I have another resistance to this this time, I mean, is it cycled through again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be because you've gone since last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my bonus, can I try and hide?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not good. It's like eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do I get advantage on the rolls? Sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you do now that he doesn't see you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay great, come on. Damn it! Okay, that's fine. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I resist 18 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it! But the tip goes into your chin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh my god. That's so great. I love it. I love it so much.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dang it, Eden! Just take it! Take the arrow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm making a nice collection of your arrows.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Throw it at the Bright Lord!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Skak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mozuu's unconscious.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Mozuu's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mozuu's pretty gone. Eden, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. All right, Bright Lord, let's see what you got! Hi-ya!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shrak is flinging everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 13! Ugh! Nine! Bonus action! Oh! 18 plus seven, that's 25!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll a d6 plus damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you've got a mark on your face from my hand! Oh, it's a poo mark! That's the mark of the shrak! The shrak lord! One!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus four, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20. Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, you got a 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say disadvantage on the wisdom saving throw, because of the natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. So seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was fun!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I died!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want you to know that after that ended, I went up and shot Eden in his sleep. To rise through the ranks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there you have it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My warchief ambitions.

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: Well, we tried to hit every angle of the orcs in the game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was great. Guys, well done. That was a blast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But not as fun as the game that's coming out on October 10. It's called "Mordor, Mordor, Mordor."

lines.name: DARIN
lines.text: No it is not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shadow of War, coming out October 10. Also out on iOS and for Android. WB Games, thank you so much for making this happen. We had a blast. Hope you guys had a good time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That shadow strike is real in the game, too. It's legit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
